data.title: Fire Emblem Fates Original Soundtrack
data.meta_description: Fire Emblem Fates Original Soundtrack (Japanese: ファイアーエムブレムｉｆオリジナルサウンドトラック Fire Emblem if Original Soundtrack) is a Fire Emblem series music album released in 2016. It contains the full original soundtrack of Fire Emblem Fates, presented on seven discs and a DVD. Unlike Fates's in-game Soundtrack, it includes songs from cutscenes and DLC.
data.text:
Fire Emblem Fates Original Soundtrack (Japanese: ファイアーエムブレムｉｆオリジナルサウンドトラック Fire Emblem if Original Soundtrack) is a Fire Emblem series music album released in 2016. It contains the full original soundtrack of Fire Emblem Fates, presented on seven discs and a DVD. Unlike Fates's in-game Soundtrack, it includes songs from cutscenes and DLC.

The album also contains an original song not found within the game. Titled "Bound by Fate (Sakura and Elise)", it is a duet between Sakura on the koto and Elise on the violin, as mentioned in their support chain on the Revelation route.

Tracks

Disc 1

Disc 1 contains songs that play before the decision at chapter 6.
